Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Ahmedabad with a stay at Tulip Inn Ahmedabad, convenient to Gujarat University. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of Gulmohar Park Mall and Sardar Patel Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including concierge services and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 1 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of meeting rooms and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 11:00 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 1 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

You'll be centrally located in Ahmedabad with a stay at Tulip Inn Ahmedabad, convenient to Gujarat University. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of Gulmohar Park Mall and Sardar Patel Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gujarat University - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Gulmohar Park Mall - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Sardar Patel Stadium - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
ISCON Mall - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Gandhi Ashram - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Hathi Singh Temple - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Sanskar Kendra Museum - 8 km / 5 mi
Manek Chowk - 8 km / 5 mi
Swaminarayan Temple - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Jama Masjid Mosque - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Naginawadi - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Adalaj Vav - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi
Swaminarayan Complex - 23.4 km / 14.6 mi
Lothal - 67.5 km / 41.9 mi

The preferred airport for Tulip Inn Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
